mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction(tran_no, prod_no, prod_name, price, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date) VALUES(seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, '${purchaseProd.prodName}', #{purchaseProd.price}, #{buyer.userId}, TRIM(#{paymentOption}), #{receiverName:VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, #{dlvyAddr:VARCHAR}, #{dlvyRequest:VARCHAR}, 2, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{dlvyDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT tran_no, prod_no, prod_name, price, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date FROM transaction WHERE tran_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.tran_no, t.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.price, u.user_id AS buyer_id, TRIM(t.payment_option) payment_option, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.demailaddr, t.dlvy_request, t.dlvy_date, TRIM(t.tran_status_code) tran_status_code, t.order_data, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM transaction t INNER JOIN users u ON t.buyer_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN product p ON t.prod_no = p.prod_no WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t.tran_no ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, t.demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date FROM transaction t) countTable
